resources.string: In Master mind, the computer generates a random code, you must crack this code!
To help you win you have the finest tools at your disposal giving you feedback on every move you make;
A grey feedback circle with an X means that the colour you have picked does not appear anywhere in the code.
A white circle means that the colour you have picked appears somewhere in the code, but not where you guessed.
And a green circle with a tick means you have picked the right number and position.
get all of them right and you win!
You won the medal Quick Grip!
